definitions.definition: To watch by craning the neck (as though it were made of rubber), especially if the observer and observed are in motion relative to each other.
examples: The driver was so busy rubbernecking , trying to get a good view of the accident, that he was almost part of another accident.

definitions.definition: To cause (someone) to watch in fascinated horror, as if rubbernecking to see a roadside accident.

main_definition: To watch by craning the neck (as though it were made of rubber), especially if the observer and observed are in motion relative to each other.
secondary_definitions: To cause (someone) to watch in fascinated horror, as if rubbernecking to see a roadside accident.
